name: teacup vase 'cuppa' collection - 1970's brown retro 'pennine' wedgewood | by CERIosities the origina
description:
teacup vase 'cuppa' collection - 1970's brown retro 'pennine' wedgewood | by CERIosities the original maker of teacup vases

yes, a vase made from trendy and funky 1970's retro 'pennine' wedgewood teacups and saucers! don't you just love picking beautiful flowers that catch your eye, i know i do! fresh flower bouquets in a teacup vases are simply charming for all to adore... this teacup vase is one of only four of it's kind, enjoy one or all four as a set [pay 10% less for the set]! 

be admired... for your creative flair in owning one for your own pleasure or for your imaginative, thoughtful and truly heartfelt gift giving that inspires others. then they too will be admired! as you've probably gathered, the fresh flowers bouquets are unable to be included. you get the pleasure of picking them yourself... :-)

whimsical teacup vases are so versatile, favourite ways happy owners and myself love to use them:

~ simply to enhance the everyday with nature and loveliness... 
~ as a floral centrepiece for a tea party, relaxing brunch with friends or an elegant evening dinner party
~ to brighten any space such as your office or reception area, waiting room
~ wake up to the beauty of fresh flowers each morning with a teacup vase beside your bed
~ as a house warming or hostess thank you gift
~ to fill a room with the wonderful smells of scented flowers
~ for a wedding or party where each table has a lovely teacup vase as a feature centrepiece!
~ as a serving plate for delicious biscuits, decadent handmade chocolates and fresh fruit
~ soothing and uplifting as a get well soon offering
~ to display business card, increasing visibility and inviting people to take a your card
~ tips 'vase' in a cafe or restaurant, attracting the customers eye to leave their change
~ as a prop for styling ie. a photo shoot, magazine layout, home interior styling
~ just to give you a few ideas.....

you can feel good knowing that someone, the community and the planet has benefited from the repurposed / upcycled nature of this teacup vase. the teacups have been bought from either individuals, charity organisations etc and have been saved from the landfill.

‘cuppa’ collection - original and genuine teacup vases created by ceri muter of CERIosites.

~ your 'cup of tea'... ? ~

want to see other teacup vase styles or other creative items, continue to indulge your curiosity at www.CERIosities.com.au

read on for specific details and to make a purchase...
